Posts.Content: Breast cancer is not just a pink ribbon. Treatment is brutal and the effects are lifelong. Is it time the world started looking at breast differently? Is it time the world started looking breastless women as beautiful? Read more about life without breast. The greatest women beauty point amputated.
Posts.Title: Life Without Breast

Posts.Content: I almost can't believe that, 1( you cancelled the first appointment coz you were too busy and 2), when you finally went to the doctor, you never told him/her about the lump because "you had other pressing issues". Are you worried? afraid? Cancer by simple definition is abnormal/immature rapidly growing cells. Every day count towards prognosis. Call now and go NOW!
Posts.Title: Lump Below Collar bone, above breast - need advice

Posts.Content: Breast density is a major risk and yes, with family history that strong, annual mammograms with religious self breast exams and clinical breast exams is warranted. Look for places that offer Automated Breast Ultrasound System (ABUS) scanning or Automated Breast Volume System Ultrasound (ABVS). These are accurate automated ultrasound scanning systems for dense breast tissue. Mammogram would miss is many times while these technologies would catch it early in dense tissued women. Ultrasound (regular) is very accurate but the problem is that the results are dependent on thee experience of the technician. Big room for human error
Posts.Title: Breast Density
